orm:named-query.name: season.findByName
orm:named-query.orm:query: select s from Season s where s.name = ?1

orm:named-query.name: player.findByName
orm:named-query.orm:query: select p from Player p where p.playername = ?1

orm:named-query.name: player.findAll
orm:named-query.orm:query: select p from Player p order by p.lastName
